channel.description: Recent content in Strategic Design on Mark Needham

item.title: Strategic Design (Responsibility Traps) - Eric Evans
item.description: Reading through some of Simon Harris’ blog entries I came across his thoughts on a presentation Eric Evans did at QCon titled ‘Strategic Design - Responsibility Traps’ which seems to cover a lot of the ground from the second half of Domain Driven Design and more. In the presentation Evans make some really insightful comments and points out a lot of mistakes that I’ve made on projects. It certainly serves as a reminder to go back and read part 4 of the book again and really understand the material from that section.
